title: Fix consecutive note saving

requirements.text: After saving a note, reset the speech recognition state to allow immediate recording of another note without requiring a page refresh

quotes: une fois que j'ai enregistré une note si je recommence ça ne fonctionne plus je veux pouvoir enregistrer plusieurs notes les unes après les autres

acceptanceCriteria: User can save a note and immediately start recording a new note without any manual intervention
The transcription input field is cleared after each successful save
The speech recognition listener remains active and ready after note save
Multiple notes can be recorded consecutively in the same session

requirements.text: Ensure the transcript state is properly cleared after each note save operation to prevent duplicate or concatenated content
acceptanceCriteria: The transcript state is empty after a note is saved
New recordings start with a clean slate
No residual text from previous recordings appears in the input field

constraints: Maintain French language labels in the UI
Keep existing speech recognition configuration for French language
nonGoals: Changing the UI layout or design
Adding new features beyond fixing consecutive saves
